item.title: Release 0.0.4
item.description:
Hello! Release 0.0.4 is here, along with it brings new styling and bugfixes. Assets have been orgnized in a slightly better manner, while bringing in some easy asides and goodies from [Octopress].
Documentation is being worked on and can be located [here]!
Thats all for now, off to more improvements and building the docs!
[octopress]:http://octopress.org [here]:/docs
